title: BREAKING: Curfew period amended; From 11 PM on Monday (16) to 5 AM on Tuesday (17)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st):  Nation-wide Curfew will be imposed from 11 PM on Monday (16) to 5 AM on Tuesday (17), said the President’s Media Division amending the previously imposed curfew period from 8 PM on Monday (16) to 5 AM on Tuesday (17).
BREAKING: Curfew period amended; From 11 PM on Monday (16) to 5 AM on Tuesday (17)
